name: zkdns
description: A secure and transparent way of querying DNS servers using zero-knowledge proofs (zkProofs).

scripts.contract:build: cd contracts && zsh -o extendedglob -c 'forge build --contracts src/**/*.sol~src/EncryptedZkDNS.sol'
scripts.contract:test: cd contracts && zsh -o extendedglob -c 'forge test -vv --contracts test/**/*.sol~src/EncryptedZkDNS.sol'
